description: This striking cookie jar makes a gorgeous gift. Simply assemble the dry ingredients of this festive cookie recipe and attach a gift tag with cooking instructions.
name: Christmas Cookie Jar Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 large peppermint candy canes, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble, layer all the jar ingredients in a sterilised jar, starting with the flour and ending with the white chocolate chips. Seal jar.
Write the following instructions on a gift tag and attach to jar.
To assemble, layer all the jar ingredients in a sterilised jar, starting with the flour and ending with the white chocolate chips. Seal jar.

Pour cookie jar ingredients into a large bowl. Add 150g melted butter and 1 lightly beaten free range egg and mix to combine. Using 1 level tablespoon at a time, roll mixture into balls and place on trays, 5cm apart.
Bake, one tray at a time, for 15 minutes or until golden. Stand cookies on trays for 10 minutes to cool. Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Serve.
